mapper.select: select * from (select mno,user_id,memo_title,memo_cont,memo_viewcnt,memo_color,memo_update,memo_modifydate from memo where user_id = #{user_id} order by mno desc)
mapper.update: update memo set memo_viewcnt = memo_viewcnt+1 where mno=#{mno}
update memo set memo_title = #{memo_title}, memo_cont = #{memo_title}, memo_color = #{memo_color} memo_modifydate = sysdate where mno = #{mno}
